title: [Hollowlair, Dreadgrounds]
description: Small skeletons lie scattered across the ground like a graveyard of great battle laid bare and given to a feast of flames.  Humanoid figures, demons, and their ilk lie strewn like the broken toys of an uncaring child's hand, while all else around them burns, steeped in sulfur and smoke.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, south, west
